Class ReservationMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReservationMgr
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class ReservationMgr
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Manager of all reservations and tables. Supports addition, removal and amendment of reservations.
    Since:
    2021-11-5
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getTotalNoOfReservations

        public int getTotalNoOfReservations()
        Return total no. of reservations
        Returns:
        total no. of reservations

      • makeReservation

        public boolean makeReservation​(Reservation r)
        Makes a reservation. Finds a suitable table that can contain the number of persons. Reservation will be added to the collection and asks the table to be marked as unavailable at the specified date and time.
        Parameters:
        r - Reservation.
        Returns:
        true if reservation has been made,false otherwise

      • cancelReservation

        public void cancelReservation​(int reservationNo)
        Cancels a reservation. Removes the Reservation from the collection and asks the table to be marked as available for other reservations at the specified date and time.
        Parameters:
        reservationNo - Reservation number.

      • updateReservation

        Update existing reservation date and time
        Parameters:
        reservationNo - reservation no. to be updated
        newTime - Time to be updated
        newDate - Date to be updated

        Parameters:
